scripts.localstack:start: docker restart intellibot-localstack || docker run --rm -d -p 4566:4566 -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock --env DOCKER_HOST=unix:///var/run/docker.sock --name intellibot-localstack localstack/localstack
scripts.localstack:stop: docker ps --filter name=intellibot-localstack -aq | xargs docker rm -f
scripts.start: yarn build && yarn localstack:start && cdklocal bootstrap && cdklocal deploy --require-approval never && awslocal lambda invoke --function-name intellibot-lambda /dev/stdout; yarn localstack:stop
